<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108026</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108026</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202631</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Civil War Journals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bürgerkrieg-Journale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Journaux de Guerre Civile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jornais Da Guerra Civil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pubblicazioni Di Guerra Civile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιοδικά εμφύλιου πολέμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diarios De la Guerra Civil</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Integrates creative writing with Social Sciences and enhances knowledge of the effects of the Civil War on people.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Integriert kreatives Schreiben mit 
Sozialwissenschaften und erhöht Wissen der Effekte des Bürgerkrieges
auf Leuten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Intègre l'écriture créatrice avec les sciences 
sociales et met en valeur la connaissance des effets de la guerre 
civile sur des personnes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Integra a escrita creativa com ciências sociais e
realça o conhecimento dos efeitos da guerra civil em povos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Integra la scrittura creativa con le scienze 
sociali ed aumenta la conoscenza degli effetti della guerra civile con
gente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενσωματώνει το δημιουργικό γράψιμο με τις κοινωνικές 
επιστήμες και ενισχύει τη γνώση των αποτελεσμάτων του εμφύλιου 
πολέμου στους ανθρώπους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Integra la escritura creativa con ciencias 
sociales y realza el conocimiento de los efectos de la guerra civil en
la gente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:GWEN A. JONES
FN:GWEN A. JONES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>

            <entry>1770202631</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
